Title: Young students! Enthusiastically participate in military cadre schools to strengthen national defense construction, ...
Designer: Suzhou Art Association (苏州美术协会)
Publisher: Suzhou Protect World Peace Committee (苏州保卫世界和平委员会), Suzhou Oppose American Imperialism Committee (苏州反对美帝侵略委员会)
Notes: The full text: Young students! Enthusiastically participate in military cadre schools to strengthen national defense construction, work hard to learn all kinds of knowledge and technologies for nation-building, organize observation teams in various defense centers, and launch school-winning campaigns!
